column4: pici, when i have Xubuntu, should lsb_release -a show me Xubuntu?
you can try this: install gtkorphan, run sudo gtkorphan, hibernate your xubuntu-desktop and hibernate linux-generic, and any other packages you want.   Lastly, remove away!
it will remove packages that aren't involved with xubuntu-desktop
well i started terminal just now to install gtkorphan
is which one i should use: apt-get or aptitude?
well, the answer is, right click on the package
but i want xubuntu run instead of ubuntu.
exactly, you should hibernate any package you want to keep
oh, i thought that hibernate is something that removes. :)
some recommends what other packages i should keep.
how i remove unneeded packages in gtkorphan?
